Title: The Legend of Bonnie and Carl
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Etan Frankel
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona gets off house arrest. Lip runs into some "big" issues at school. Ian and Mickey blackmail rich old family men, and Carl finds true love in detention, in a girl who is just as messed up as he is. Debbie is jealous of a new girl.
